flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 1000/25=<<1000/25=40.0>>40.0 sections
She gives away 40.0/4=<<40.0/4=10.0>>10.0 sections
So she keeps 40.0-10.0=<<40.0-10.0=26.0>>26.0 sections
She keeps 26.0/2=<<26.0/2=13.0>>13.0 sections on hand

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30.0, not 26.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
